mapper.insert: insert into weizu_fund_net_worth( fund_id, net_worth, worth_date, day_growth, expect_worth_Date, expect_worth, expect_growth )values( #{fundId}, #{netWorth}, #{worthDate}, #{dayGrowth}, #{expectWorthDate}, #{expectWorth}, #{expectGrowth} )
mapper.update: update weizu_fund_net_worth set fund_id=#{fundId}, net_worth = #{netWorth}, worth_date = #{worthDate}, day_growth = #{dayGrowth}, expect_worth_Date = #{expectWorthDate}, expect_worth = #{expectWorth}, expect_growth = #{expectGrowth} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select fund.id, fund.fund_id, fund.net_worth, fund.worth_date, fund.day_growth, fund.expect_worth_Date, fund.expect_worth, fund.expect_growth from weizu_fund_net_worth as fund where 1 = 1
